text:
Gardner is a city in Johnson County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 19,123 people there. It is in the Kansas City metropolitan area.
Geography.
Gardner is at (38.812367, -94.918621). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. Of that, is land and is water.
Climate.
Gardner has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. The Köppen Climate Classification system says that Gardner has a humid subtropical climate. It is abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says there were 19,123 people, 6,644 households, and 4,938 families living in Gardner.
